original_text: Moses also took all the fat around the internal organs, the long lobe of the liver, and both kidneys and their fat, and burned it on the altar.
korean_text: 또 내장에 덮인 모든 기름과 간 꺼풀과 두 콩팥과 그 기름을 가져다가 모세가 제단 위에 불사르고

sentences.original_text: Moses also took all the fat around the internal organs
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 또 내장 주위의 모든 기름을 취하고

sentences.original_text: the long lobe of the liver
and both kidneys and their fat
and burned it on the altar
